short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock real-time email tracking with TraceMail and receive instant notifications the moment your email is read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Maximize your email effectiveness with TraceMail.io, the ultimate Chrome extension for seamless email tracking. Designed for professionals who value engagement insights, TraceMail.io transforms your email communication into an easy to use experience.

Key Features:
-	Instant email read alerts
-	Track when links are opened
-       Track when documents are opened 
-	Detailed tracking reports
-	Seamless integration with Gmail UI
-       TraceScan, get insights of incoming emails that may track you
-	AI Email Assistant for insights, suggestions, and draft creation

Privacy and Compliance Notice: TraceMail.io is committed to upholding the highest standards of data privacy and compliance with global regulations. Please review our privacy policy for more details.

Support and Feedback: We're constantly refining our extension. For support or to share feedback, contact us at info@tracemail.io.

Embrace the future of email communication with TraceMail.io – your insight into the world of email engagement.
